title: Modern Liverpool City Escape Near Royal Alfred Docks with Rooftop Terrace, Restaurant & Gym
description: Stumble upon luxurious dwellings and welcoming spaces at The Halyard Liverpool, an IHG Hotel, nestled in the heart of Liverpool's vibrant Ropewalks district. Uncover the history of the worldâ€™s most iconic band at the Beatles Story Museum and explore the city's rich musical heritage and gastronomic culture at a variety of cafes, restaurants and bars. Return to the hotel's sumptuous interiors, where you can unwind in the elegant Halyard Restaurant over delicious British dishes, or take in sparkling city views from the rooftop terrace.
location_description: Vignette Collection The Halyard Liverpool, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 123 Duke Street, Liverpool L1 5BB, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Liverpool City Centre, Uk
title: North England Urban Escape near Liverpool Lime Street Station
description: Found in the heart of the Northern city, Holiday Inn Liverpool City Centre, an IHG Hotel is a peaceful retreat in the middle of all Liverpool's action. Start the morning at your own pace, whether energising your body at the fitness centre or enjoying a proper English breakfast at View Restaurant overlooking the energetic St Georges Quarter.  When ready, venture out to hunt a bargain in trendy boutiques, catch a show at the Royal Court Theatre or discover Liverpool's vibrant nightlife after dark.
location_description: Holiday Inn Liverpool - City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Lime Street, Liverpool, L1 1NQ United Kingdom

title: Heritage Liverpool City Break near Albert Dock
description: Hotel Indigo Liverpool, an IHG Hotel, welcomes you to celebrate the city's heritage through local tunes, splashes of colour and cotton-themed murals from their quirky, industrial-style hotel. Come for the enviable location in the renowned waterfront district - just steps from the club that made The Beatles stars, Albert Dock and Mersey River - and stay for the welcoming service and authentic onsite dining that pays homage to the rich heritage of Liverpool.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Liverpool, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 10 Chapel St, Liverpool L3 9AG, United Kingdom

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Liverpool John Lennon Airport
title: Heritage Liverpool Airport Escape with Art Deco Restaurant
description: Visit the birthplace of The Beatles when you stay at the conveniently located Crowne Plaza Liverpool John Lennon Airport, an IHG Hotel. When not following the footsteps of music royalty, stroll across the road to the New Mersey Shopping Park for an easy feed or shop. Housed in a Grade II 1930s former Speke Aerodrome building, this hotel makes for the quintessential heritage stay with Starways Art Deco restaurant, open all day to curb your craving for European-inspired dishes.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Liverpool John Lennon Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Liverpool, Airport, Speke, Aerodrome L24 8QD, United Kingdom

vendor_name: The Municipal Hotel & Spa - MGallery Liverpool
title: Liverpool City Centre Landmark Hotel Near Albert Dock with Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Steeped in heritage on Liverpool's historic Dale Street, one of the city's original seven streets, The Municipal Hotel & Spa is top example of timeless elegance. This landmark building houses 179 well-appointed rooms, the award-winning Thermae Spa with a serene 16m pool, and dining options that celebrate Liverpool's rich maritime connections.

Ideally positioned in the city centre, this hotel is moments from cultural attractions including the Royal Albert Dock and the Grade I-listed Royal Liver Building. Just eight minutes from Lime Street Station and a short stroll to Liverpool ONE shopping district, it's the perfect base to explore while indulging in exceptional treatments and dining.
location_description: The Municipal Hotel and Spa Liverpool - MGallery Collection
offer_address: Municipal Building Dale Street, Liverpool L2 2DH, UK

title: Liverpool Waterfront Escape near the Famous Albert Dock
description: Once a major port city rich in maritime history, Liverpool is now a vibrant, cosmopolitan hub of trendy restaurants, shopping and nightlife, and it's yours to discover from Crowne Plaza Liverpool City Centre, an IHG Hotel. The hotel is perfectly placed overlooking the waterfront, just a short stroll from the iconic Albert Dock, The Beatles Story and Tate Liverpool Art Museum. When you're not sightseeing, take a dip in the hotel's indoor swimming pool, enjoy a session in the sauna or order a cocktail from the Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Liverpool City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2 St Nicholas Place, Liverpool, Lancashire, GB, L3 1QW
